clues.text: Attention, Colonel Sanders: the ghost of one of these birds has been seen flapping around Highgate since the 1600s

clues.response: the Susan B. Anthony dollar coin

clues.text: Alice in Wonderland could tell you that a looking-glass is a synonym for one of these

As a verb, this Aboriginal weapon is a synonym for backfire
If someone asks you for another term for one of these books made famous by Roget, tell him, "synonym finder"

Geese & these birds that include the trumpeter type mate for life; ducks are more promiscuous
